episodes.title: Fire Dreaming
episodes.description: After the battles in the Outlands, all is well in CHIMA. But Eris is having disturbing dreams of fire … what do the dreams mean? In a deep dark cave, ancient Tribes of fierce Hunters awaken after thousands of years of dreamless sleep. They march to the surface … their goal is simple: To conquer all of the CHI.

episodes.title: Attack of the Ice Clan
episodes.description: Led by the Saber Tooth Tiger Sir Fangar, the Hunters advance and their crushing ice spreads across CHIMA. In a battle of the Crocodile Swamp, the animal Tribes fight back but learn that their weapons are powerless against this new enemy.

episodes.title: The Call of CAVORA
episodes.description: CHIMA is overrun by the Hunters who freeze everything in their path. Eris convinces Cragger and Laval that the answer to stop the Hunters is at the top of Mount Cavora. And in a daring climb, they access the mystical mountain and meet the fabled guardian of CHIMA – The Phoenix.

episodes.title: Trial by Fire
episodes.description: The Hunters continue their relentless attacks on CHIMA. The Phoenix leader Fluminox tries to recruit Eris to join the Phoenix but is less enthusiastic about non-birds like Laval and Cragger. And Laval and Cragger must prove themselves worthy of the Fire CHI in a “trial by fire” – literally!

episodes.title: The Crescent
episodes.description: By order of the Phoenix, King Laval, Cragger, Eris and their friends must defend a mysterious hill against the Hunter Tribes. They discover that the hill is strangely immune to the Hunters’ Ice Powers. But when Skinnet the Skunk joins the fight, the heroes get another problem to deal with … who will save them this time?

episodes.title: Fired Up!
episodes.description: When the Tribes of Chima, armed with ample Fire CHI, launch a furious counter-assault against the Hunters, Fangar and his cohorts disappear underground.  They now use an ancient tunnel system under CHIMA to move about.  Fangar becomes obsessed with catching the Phoenix boy Flinx, the child of his arch-enemy King Fluminox. But Flinx has a few tricks up his sleeve.

episodes.title: Cool and Collected
episodes.description: Our heroes continue pushing back the Hunters with their Fire CHI powered vehicles but when they search the sites of the Hunters’ attacks, they can’t find any of the defeated animals… What has happened to them?

episodes.title: The Snowball Effect
episodes.description: Laval and Li’Ella’s relationship grows as he gives her a tour of the Lion City. But distracted, he misses a key battle against the Hunters. Tormak joins the fight and saves the day. But the Lion King Lagravis is captured and brought to the Ice Fort. Who will lead the Lions now?!?

episodes.title: The King Thing
episodes.description: In his father’s absence, Laval is forced to take over as King of the Lion Tribe … a role that does not suit him well. The Hunters launch yet another major attack on the Lion City. The Phoenix’ must come to the rescue yet again but Fangar does not go down without a fight and gets the last word …

episodes.title: A Very Slippery Slope
episodes.description: Laval tries to mount a rescue to save the Kings and Li’Ella but Flinx accidentally thaws out Fangars trophy room and they end up having to fight both the Hunters, Scorpions, Spiders and Bats.

episodes.title: The Artifact
episodes.description: Desperate to save his daughter, Tormak betrays the Phoenix and steals the Map known as the Artifact. But the theft does not go as planned. Charred in an unexpected explosion, Tormak now finds himself pursued by both the Phoenix and the Hunters.

episodes.title: The Phoenix Has Landed
episodes.description: Saddened to see his father distraught over the loss of the Map and his best friend Tormak, Flinx boldly sneaks off to confront Fangar on his own but falls into a clever trap.  King Fluminox who has now lost his son, too, can no longer stay above the fray. Laval, Eris and Cragger join him in a daring rescue mission in the flying Blazing Bastion … but yet another trap awaits.

episodes.title: A Spark of Hope
episodes.description: CHIMA is frozen. The heroes are trapped in the Gorge of Eternal Depth. The Hunters are preparing their ultimate assault on the Lion City and Mt. Cavora. Another legend is revealed and an ally from the past makes a surprising return. Maybe, just maybe, there may still be a spark of hope.

episodes.title: Wings of Fire
episodes.description: CHIMAs is frozen over … The map to the eight Fire Wings has been destroyed … Sir Fangar and the Hunters march on the Lion City and Mount Cavora. All hope seems lost. The heroes are desperate and venture into the savage Outlands, hoping to find a spark of hope.

episodes.title: The Heart of Cavora
episodes.description: It is CHIMA’s coldest hour … The Hunters have launched their final attack on the Lion City and Mount Cavora. The Tribes, aided by the Phoenix, fight bravely, but all hope rests on uncovering the rest of the eight ancient Fire Wings – the only things powerful enough to launch the Great Illumination and end the destructive conflict. But Sir Fangar will stop at nothing and unleashes the last of the Hunter tribes … the most powerful yet. These are the last Legends of CHIMA.
